subject: Concussions
Transgender and Transsexual
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Kye Allums, the transgender member of the George Washington women’s team, whose season was cut short by two concussions, said he would not play his senior year.
snippet: Kye Allums, the transgender member of the George Washington women’s team, whose season was cut short by two concussions, said he would not play his senior year.
